reviews.review_msg: Christina is a good prof, but the course was made harder than it needs to be. I took this class as an elective and ended up being the hardest class. The class average for the midterm was 50%. The assignments are also marked very hard. Just because it's an online class does not mean its okay to make the course more difficult than it needs to be.
Great prof! Always willing to help and makes concepts easy to understand

Christina is such a caring prof! You know she wants you to succeed, and she tries her best to make her lectures clear and concise (while still being super funny!). She's by far one of the most approachable, down-to-earth profs I've had, and if you visit her in office hours you can meet her dog!!!!! I cannot recommend this woman ENOUGH
Lectures are fun and she really does explain things in a way that makes them easy to understand :)

Christina was great for 304, but the style of her exams were different, but not necessarily a bad thing. you could tell she wanted the students to do well and knew what she was doing but sometimes she'd get lost in what she was trying to explain. Overall quite good though!
